WorkItem.Description:
I tried installing the new TS 1.5 beta, but had to uninstall due to an issue w/ it handling webgl variables. (i have another issue open for that).

However, I was unable to successfully revert back to 1.4 even after numerous repairs/reinstalls of tsc 1.4 and 1.5 and even a repair of all visual studio.

This was one of the errors  I was getting:
Error	2	The specified task executable location "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\1.4\1.4\tsc.exe" is invalid.	C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft\VisualStudio\v12.0\TypeScript\Microsoft.TypeScript.targets	103	5	TypeScriptHTMLApp7

Essentially all the repairs and reinstalls were placing the sdk at: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\1.4\tsc.exe" instead of : "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\1.4\1.4\tsc.exe", which was where VS was looking.

So to fix i just moved everything to where it was looking for it.
WorkItem.Summary: Tsc 1.4 compiler error after reverting from 1.5 beta
